title: 1928 Ford Roadster Pickup with Removable Top (Replacement Head Included)
item_description:
1928 Ford Roadster Pickup with Removable Top (Replacement Head Included)

Specifications

  • Year: 1928
  • Make: Ford
  • Model: Roadster Pickup
  • Vehicle ID per title: A312276
  • License: EVT933
    • Registration Expiration: NA 
    • Not currently registered
    • Planned Non-Operation completed January 20, 1990
  • Odometer Reads: 8,762
  • Key: Available
  • Engine: Cracked Head - 4 Cylinder Model A
  • Fuel Type: Gasoline
  • Transmission: Manual
  • Deck Length: 55”
  • Deck Width: 41”
  • Wall Height: 13”

Note: Vehicle VIN and license plate no longer on record with Calirofnia DMV. The vehicle has not been registered since 1990. Certificate of Title (from 1981), Transfer Form, will be mailed within 1 week after the removal. The vehicle has not been registered since 1990. The seller purchased this vehicle and did not complete the transfer into their name. The buyer will need to complete a vehicle inspection and weight certificate from a weigh station. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of re-registration, inspections, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV.
